La solucin es una profunda limpieza interna y algunos sencillos ajustes en tus hbitos cotidianos para acabar con los antojos poco saludables (no te preocupes, no se requiere de fuerza de voluntad), adelgazar y llenarte de energa. El plan de la doctora Chaudhary no se basa en prohibiciones ni en comidas obligadas: Reprogrmate le da un vuelco de 180 a todo lo que creamos saber sobre salud y alimentacin para dejar de hacer dietas al revs, recuperar nuestra salud neurolgica y comenzar a perder peso instantneamente.ENGLISH DESCRIPTION Are diets not working for you? This book offers the keys to thoroughly with program that combines ayurveda -- the world's oldest holistic natural healing systems -- and the best of western medicine. Neurologist Kulreet Chaudhary discovered a her patients: they naturally and unexpectedly lost extra weight. Now, in her first book, she reveals that neuro-ayurvedic system, whose purpose was to balance the digestive system and get rid of toxins, also burns extra fat and energizes the mind. Reprogram Your Body explains why when the body is intoxicated it is impossible to lose weight and keep the weight off. The solution is a deep cleanse and some simple adjustments in your daily end body.
